title.rendered: Global Finance for People and Planet

excerpt.rendered: During this interactive roundtable, you will help formulate recommendations for Commonwealth Finance Ministers. Please note that spaces are limited to those with knowledge and experience in debt justice, climate finance and climate advocacy.
